original_text:
**Fix**  
All message timestamps will be converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) at the point of queue insertion, eliminating reliance on system-local time.
units: All message timestamps will be converted to Coordinated Universal Time ( UTC ) at the point of queue insertion , eliminating reliance on system - local time .
eliminating reliance on system - local time

original_text: A DST flag will be added to the message header for diagnostic transparency, allowing downstream systems to detect whether the message originated during a DST transition.
units: A DST flag will be added to the message header for diagnostic transparency , allowing downstream systems to detect whether the message originated during a DST transition .
allowing downstream systems to detect whether the message originated during a DST transition
downstream systems to detect whether the message originated during a DST transition
whether the message originated during a DST transition
